### Description

Basic meteorologic time series data types, transformation, basic operations and visualization. German course language facilitates first steps with R for german beginners. The course is part of the e-learning program "RLab â€“ Skriptbasierte modulare Umweltstatistik" (https://rlab.blogs.uni-hamburg.de, funded by BMBF 01PL17033)

### Installation

```r
swirl::install_course("Einfuehrung_in_Datenhandling_und_Visualisieren_von_Klimadaten")
```

#### Manual Installation

1. Download [this](http://swirlstats.com/scn/Einfuehrung_in_Datenhandling_und_Visualisieren_von_Klimadaten.swc) file.
2. Run `swirl::install_course()` in the R console.
3. Select the file you just downloaded.
